content: प्लक्षः [प्लक्ष्यते कीटैः प्लक्ष्-कर्मणि घञ्] {@--1@} {1} The Indian fig-tree; प्लक्षप्ररोह इव सौधतलं बिभेद <ls>R. 8. 93</ls>; <ls n="R.">13. 71.</ls> {@--2@} One of the seven Dvīpas or continents of the world. {@--3@} A side or back-door, a private entrance. {@--4@} The space at the side of a door.
